name: BreakThrough (Jarod de Cleen)
description:
Controls

You can move around with the WASD keys / Left analog stick.
Look around with the Mouse / Right analog stick.
Swing with the Left mouse button / Right trigger

Description

This is a game based on a break-out game. But you can play against your friends! (Or AI if you don't have any). You need a controller if you want to play with a friend locally. You can customize both characters, and give them names!
But your not alone. There's also an audience! They will throw random stuff towards any of the player's field every now and then.

Also the game is endless. There's no endscreen atm.

IMPORTANT, ONLINE DOES NOT WORK.
